The config looks correct. The password matches. But authentication is failing. This usually means hydroxide's internal auth token expired. I need to re-auth with hydroxide.

args.command: pkill -9 -f hydroxide; sleep 2; rm -rf ~/.cache/hydroxide ~/.config/hydroxide 2>/dev/null; echo "Cleared hydroxide state"

- Not urgent enough to alert Andy this early
